original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: na asaṅkiliṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na asaṅkiliṭṭha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na asaṅkiliṭṭham dhamma

original: paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho ca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭhañca na asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
